Description:
Qualified Chartered Accountant 
Excellent knowledge on MIS and analytical support and financial analysis
Good understanding of VAT and other corporate tax compliance
5 to 8 years experience in Finance/IFRS/Tax   What equips you for the roleProfessionally qualified Chartered Accountant
